22 km from Auranagabad en route to Ellora. many share taxi,autos ply throughout the day. Regular state buses run every 15 mts. or drive  on peaceful and calm road and peak on to Daulatabad  fort while you drive.

value: , the last of the great Mughals.

You will find many veg and non-veg dishes here. Sheeq kabab and shikampur are famous non veg dishes, and in veg the most popular dish of Maharashtra. Vada pao and puri bhaji are also available. There are many stalls and thela are on each road for a standing refreshment, and some good restaurants are readily available so ignore the stalls and have a enjoyable meal at any clean restaurants. Khuladabad is also famous for its strawberries and apples.
